thread.title: Photo of the Day: Bill Cosby’s Ebony Cover Shatters His Legacy

author: newsr.in
title: Photo of the Day: Bill Cosby’s Ebony Cover Shatters His Legacy
text: The November issue of Ebony Magazine, the leading black lifestyle publication, is taking a hammer to Bill Cosby’s legacy by drawing a clear line between him as a person and his lovable, iconic character Cliff Huxtable on The Bill Cosby show. The photo, revealed on Twitter some hours ago, has already gone viral, and it’s not difficult to understand why: it shows a photo from the popular TV series, framed in glass. The glass is shattered right above Cosby’s face, which is ... »
